short_summary: Provide accommodations and meals for a 2024 course.
description: The Department of National Defense (DND) requires a Contractor to provide accommodations, onsite meals and bagged meals to-go in support of the Advanced Mountain Operations (AMO) course taking place from 22 January 2024 to 6 March 2024.
full_summary:
#Government of Canada
## Tender Announcement: W2037-240076 - Accommodations and Meals

### Announcement Details

* **Title**: W2037-240076 - Accommodations and Meals
* **Reference Number**: WS4269606670-Doc4292215888
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4269606670
* **Publication Date**: 2023-11-22
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-08 14:00:00 EST
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-11-22

### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-01-12
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31
* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: The following are the list of trade agreements apply to this procurement:
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: The following regions are included in this contract:
	+ Alberta
